content: **video on how to knit this hat from start to finish here 1 ** hilariously adorable and a little bit silly this hat takes puppy cuteness to the next level heavenly soft and light as air the suggested yarn is a dream to knit with the pom-pom is fuzzy and nearly weightless so it does not flop over to one side pull or or weigh down on the hat in any way this hat is as cute as it is functional and it brings a smile to anyone who sees it designed to fit a miniature dachshund to perfection your doxie will love the feel of this super soft snugly hat this knitted hat will keep your doggie s ears toasty and warm without inhibiting movement this pattern is worked both flat and in the round and is entirely seamless the yarn is inexpensive and comes in lots of fun colors the instructions for this knitting pattern are extra detailed and super clear so you can rest assured that there will be only smooth sailing as you coast through this super fun knitting project the pattern even comes with illustrative photos on how to make the pom-pom **size ** fits all mini dachshunds and other small dogs with a head that measures 10 around **yarn weight ** worsted **yardage ** 82 yards/75 meters **suggested yarn ** 1 skein drops air mix 70% alpaca 23% polyamide 7% wool 164 yards / 150 meters color used in photos 11 **follow me online ** **twitter ** https //twitter com/valyaboutenko **pinterest ** https //www pinterest com/boutenko/fun-knitting-projects/ **facebook ** https //www facebook com/valya boutenko **patreon ** https //www patreon com/user u=4541465 **ravelry ** lucky fox knits **instagram ** luckyfoxknits **youtube ** lucky fox knits 1 https //youtu be/y-oy_eghyfm
